import { Employee } from '@/module/employee'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-system-access-form', templateUrl: './system-access-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./system-access-form.component.scss'] }) export class SystemAccessFormComponent implements OnInit{ employee:Employee = new Employee() ngOnInit() { } on_click_system_access_form(){ alert(this.employee.avc) } }
